title: Did NBC Miss The Point With Rachel Dolezal?
teaser: NPR's Eric Deggans makes the case that NBC's "Today" show bungled its exclusive interview with the former NAACP official.
contentencoded:
Former NAACP official Rachel Dolezal became the center of a national discussion on racial identity following allegations that she lied about being black.

On Tuesday, she granted her first interview since the controversy sparked late last week to NBC’s “Today” show. NPR Television Critic Eric Deggans tells Here & Now’s Robin Young how the network bungled the exclusive interview.

Guest

  • Eric Deggans, TV critic for NPR. He tweets @Deggans.
